tool_description: Validates and cleans raw location data by checking coordinate accuracy, removing invalid entries, and standardizing formats for downstream processing.

raw_location_data.description: Array of raw location data points containing coordinates and timestamps

time_window_hours.description: Time window for data validation in hours (1-168)

error_messages: Invalid location format: Ensure location data contains valid latitude/longitude coordinates between -90 to 90 and -180 to 180 respectively.
Accuracy threshold out of range: Set accuracy_threshold between 1 and 100 meters.
Invalid time window: Set time_window_hours between 1 and 168 hours.
Insufficient data points: Provide at least 1 location data point in the array.
usage: Provide raw_location_data array with coordinate strings; optionally set accuracy_threshold and time_window_hours. The tool returns validated location records with quality scores.

validated_count.description: Number of location points that passed validation

rejected_count.description: Number of location points rejected due to quality issues

validated_locations.description: Array of validated location data points in standardized format

quality_score.description: Overall data quality score from 0 to 1
